configuration.name: 客户使用状态图
configuration.query: SELECT c_state , c_state , c c_count FROM ( SELECT '客户' AS c_state, count(0) AS c FROM t_customer t WHERE 1=1 UNION SELECT '售后' AS c_state, count(0) AS c FROM t_customer t WHERE t.c_state = '售后' AND 1=1 UNION SELECT '有意愿' AS c_state, count(0) AS c FROM t_customer t WHERE t.c_client_aspiration = '有意愿' AND 1=1 UNION SELECT '使用较好' AS c_state, count(0) AS c FROM t_customer t WHERE t.c_is_good = 1 AND 1=1 UNION SELECT '样板' AS c_state, count(0) AS c FROM t_customer t WHERE t.c_is_template = 1 AND 1=1 UNION SELECT '精品样板' AS c_state, count(0) AS c FROM t_customer t WHERE t.c_is_template_boutique = 1 AND 1=1 ) tt
